properties.Description: Role assignment schedule request properties with scope.

scope.Description: The role assignment schedule request scope.

principalType.Description: The principal type of the assigned principal ID. Possible values include: 'User', 'Group', 'ServicePrincipal'

requestType.Description: The type of the role assignment schedule request. Eg: SelfActivate, AdminAssign etc. Possible values include: 'AdminAssign', 'AdminRemove', 'AdminUpdate', 'AdminExtend', 'AdminRenew', 'SelfActivate', 'SelfDeactivate', 'SelfExtend', 'SelfRenew'

status.Description: The status of the role assignment schedule request. Possible values include: 'Accepted', 'PendingEvaluation', 'Granted', 'Denied', 'PendingProvisioning', 'Provisioned', 'PendingRevocation', 'Revoked', 'Canceled', 'Failed', 'PendingApprovalProvisioning', 'PendingApproval', 'FailedAsResourceIsLocked', 'PendingAdminDecision', 'AdminApproved', 'AdminDenied', 'TimedOut', 'ProvisioningStarted', 'Invalid', 'PendingScheduleCreation', 'ScheduleCreated', 'PendingExternalProvisioning'

approvalId.Description: The approvalId of the role assignment schedule request.

targetRoleAssignmentScheduleId.Description: The resultant role assignment schedule id or the role assignment schedule id being updated

targetRoleAssignmentScheduleInstanceId.Description: The role assignment schedule instance id being updated

scheduleInfo.Description: Schedule info of the role assignment schedule

linkedRoleEligibilityScheduleId.Description: The linked role eligibility schedule id - to activate an eligibility.

ticketInfo.Description: Ticket Info of the role assignment

condition.Description: The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase 'foo_storage_container'

conditionVersion.Description: Version of the condition. Currently accepted value is '2.0'

createdOn.Description: DateTime when role assignment schedule request was created

requestorId.Description: Id of the user who created this request

startDateTime.Description: Start DateTime of the role assignment schedule.

expiration.Description: Expiration of the role assignment schedule

type.Description: Type of the role assignment schedule expiration. Possible values include: 'AfterDuration', 'AfterDateTime', 'NoExpiration'

endDateTime.Description: End DateTime of the role assignment schedule.

duration.Description: Duration of the role assignment schedule in TimeSpan.

ticketNumber.Description: Ticket number for the role assignment

ticketSystem.Description: Ticket system name for the role assignment

properties.Description: Role eligibility schedule request properties with scope.

scope.Description: The role eligibility schedule request scope.

principalType.Description: The principal type of the assigned principal ID. Possible values include: 'User', 'Group', 'ServicePrincipal'

requestType.Description: The type of the role assignment schedule request. Eg: SelfActivate, AdminAssign etc. Possible values include: 'AdminAssign', 'AdminRemove', 'AdminUpdate', 'AdminExtend', 'AdminRenew', 'SelfActivate', 'SelfDeactivate', 'SelfExtend', 'SelfRenew'

status.Description: The status of the role eligibility schedule request. Possible values include: 'Accepted', 'PendingEvaluation', 'Granted', 'Denied', 'PendingProvisioning', 'Provisioned', 'PendingRevocation', 'Revoked', 'Canceled', 'Failed', 'PendingApprovalProvisioning', 'PendingApproval', 'FailedAsResourceIsLocked', 'PendingAdminDecision', 'AdminApproved', 'AdminDenied', 'TimedOut', 'ProvisioningStarted', 'Invalid', 'PendingScheduleCreation', 'ScheduleCreated', 'PendingExternalProvisioning'

approvalId.Description: The approvalId of the role eligibility schedule request.

scheduleInfo.Description: Schedule info of the role eligibility schedule

targetRoleEligibilityScheduleId.Description: The resultant role eligibility schedule id or the role eligibility schedule id being updated

targetRoleEligibilityScheduleInstanceId.Description: The role eligibility schedule instance id being updated

ticketInfo.Description: Ticket Info of the role eligibility

condition.Description: The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase 'foo_storage_container'

conditionVersion.Description: Version of the condition. Currently accepted value is '2.0'

createdOn.Description: DateTime when role eligibility schedule request was created

requestorId.Description: Id of the user who created this request

startDateTime.Description: Start DateTime of the role eligibility schedule.

expiration.Description: Expiration of the role eligibility schedule

type.Description: Type of the role eligibility schedule expiration. Possible values include: 'AfterDuration', 'AfterDateTime', 'NoExpiration'

endDateTime.Description: End DateTime of the role eligibility schedule.

duration.Description: Duration of the role eligibility schedule in TimeSpan.

ticketNumber.Description: Ticket number for the role eligibility

ticketSystem.Description: Ticket system name for the role eligibility

properties.Description: Role management policy properties with scope.

displayName.Description: The role management policy display name.

isOrganizationDefault.Description: The role management policy is default policy.

rules.Description: The rule applied to the policy.

effectiveRules.Description: The readonly computed rule applied to the policy.

target.Description: The role management policy rule target.

level.Description: The assignment level to which it is applied.

isApprovalRequired.Description: Determine whether approval is required or not.

isApprovalRequiredForExtension.Description: Determine whether approval is required for assignment extension.

approvalMode.Description: The type of rule. Possible values include: 'SingleStage', 'Serial', 'Parallel', 'NoApproval'

approvalStages.Description: The approval stages of the request.

approvalStageTimeOutInDays.Description: The time in days when approval request would be timed out.

isApproverJustificationRequired.Description: Determine whether approver need to provide justification for his decision.

escalationTimeInMinutes.Description: The time in minutes when the approval request would be escalated if the primary approver does not approves.

primaryApprovers.Description: The primary approver of the request.

isEscalationEnabled.Description: The value determine whether escalation feature is enabled.

escalationApprovers.Description: The escalation approver of the request.

isBackup.Description: The value indicating whether the user is a backup fallback approver

id.Description: The object id of the user.

isEnabled.Description: The value indicating if rule is enabled.

isExpirationRequired.Description: The value indicating whether expiration is required.

maximumDuration.Description: The maximum duration of expiration in timespan.

notificationType.Description: The type of notification. Possible values include: 'Email'

notificationLevel.Description: The notification level. Possible values include: 'NONE', 'CRITICAL', 'ALL'

recipientType.Description: The recipient type. Possible values include: 'Requestor', 'Approver', 'Admin'

properties.Description: Role management policy assignment properties with scope.

roleDefinitionId.Description: The role definition of management policy assignment.

policyId.Description: The policy id role management policy assignment.
